Row.Text: Hah! You ain't got a chance in hell of takin' me down! C'mon then, my spear's gotten rusty!
Hah! You ain't got a chance in hell of takin' me down! C'mon then, my spear's gotten rusty!
Tch. You fight dirty, goin' after someone who's at their weakest. You son of a bitch...!
Tch. You fight dirty, goin' after someone who's at their weakest. You son of a bitch...!
You serious? With THAT army? Pffhahaha! OK, I'll let you have your little fun! I'll show ya what it means to be on top of the food chain!
You serious? With THAT army? Pffhahaha! OK, I'll let you have your little fun! I'll show ya what it means to be on top of the food chain!
You think you've won, but this ain't over. I'll escape from your prison. I'll rob all your citizens blind. I'll convince them to riot against you. This fight's only just begun.
...God, why did you let this happen to me...again? What did I do so wrong...? Are...are you even up there, in the first place? Heh...obviously not...hahahaha...
Yo. You look pretty important; you another leader or somethin'? Look, we may as well try to get along, y'know? Name's Kyouko. Here, wanna piece of Rocky?
Huh. Lookin' at you, you must be another ruler. Let's get to the point: name's Kyouko, and I don't take bullshit from nobody. Stay out of my way and we'll be good. 'kay?
'sup? Wanna go get a bite to eat 'fore we start talkin' about national issues?
Yo! Before we start talkin' about all that diplomacy stuff, let's play a round of that dance game first!
Yo.
'sup.
You're annoyin'. REAL annoyin'. Make it quick.
You're annoyin'. REAL annoyin'. Make it quick.
The hell do YOU want?
The hell do YOU want?
I know exactly what your army's doin' near my borders. Scopin' out my territory. I should know; I've done it a lot myself. Now, back off or we're gonna have problems.
Look. There's this stuff called "territory", and we each got our own. Yours is gettin' way too far into mine. Back off and quit settin' up near me.
Yo. Whaddya say we allow Open Borders between us? Might cut down on turf wars.
Yo. Whaddya say we allow Open Borders between us? Might cut down on turf wars.
This wasn't too bad of a deal. Wanna keep it goin'?
This wasn't too bad of a deal. Wanna keep it goin'?
Speakin' as a thief, you're practically stealin' from me with this deal now. We gotta talk about this one again.
Speakin' as a thief, you're practically stealin' from me with this deal now. We gotta talk about this one again.
Man, you're rich, ain't ya? Not gonna lie, little jealous of ya right now. Don't worry, I won't steal from ya. Well, not too much, anyway! Hahaha!
Man, you're rich, ain't ya? Not gonna lie, little jealous of ya right now. Don't worry, I won't steal from ya. Well, not too much, anyway! Hahaha!
You got one hell of a fightin' force to your name. Glad I'm on your good side.[NEWLINE]I AM on your good side, ain't I?
You got one hell of a fightin' force to your name. Glad I'm on your good side.[NEWLINE]I AM on your good side, ain't I?
So, uhh...you're, uh, not too bad. Ya wanna tell the world we're friends? Nobody's gonna mess with us if we work together!
So, uhh...you're, uh, not too bad. Ya wanna tell the world we're friends? Nobody's gonna mess with us if we work together!
Looks like we're gettin' a little alliance goin'! Me, {1_CivName}, an' now you! There ain't nothing we can't take on now!
Looks like we're gettin' a little alliance goin'! Me, {1_CivName}, an' now you! There ain't nothing we can't take on now!
Ya know what? If {1_CivName} thinks you're alright, then, hey, so do I.
Ya know what? If {1_CivName} thinks you're alright, then, hey, so do I.
Yo. Let's trade embassies. I need a place to crash when I'm over in your territory.
Yo. Let's trade embassies. I need a place to crash when I'm over in your territory.
Yo. Let's trade embassies. I need a place to crash when I'm over in your territory.
Yo. Let's trade embassies. I need a place to crash when I'm over in your territory.
I'm past all that stealin' stuff. Obviously, though, you ain't. You really got some explainin' to do about that spy we caught. Now, start talkin'. Now.
I'm past all that stealin' stuff. Obviously, though, you ain't. You really got some explainin' to do about that spy we caught. Now, start talkin'. Now.
Let's finish off {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} as soon as we can! I'm gettin' sick of lookin' at 'em!
Let's finish off {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} as soon as we can! I'm gettin' sick of lookin' at 'em!
Alright.
Alright.
Yeah, that works.
Yeah, that works.
'kay.
'kay.
Huh, that was pretty nice of you.
Huh, that was pretty nice of you.
I'm listenin'.
I'm listenin'.
Alright, but I ain't gonna give ya my last Rocky stick.
Whatcha want?
Whatcha want?
Nah. But hey, we might could still work somethin' out.
Nah. But hey, we might could still work somethin' out.
What a joke! Quit wastin' my time with ridiculous offers like that!
What a joke! Quit wastin' my time with ridiculous offers like that!
Mmm, yeah, we can do that.
Mmm, yeah, we can do that.
Take it or leave it.
Take it or leave it.
How's this sound?
That ain't gonna happen. May as well forget it.
That ain't gonna happen. May as well forget it.
Thanks.
Thanks.
'ppreciate it.
Awesome.
You're alright.
Sweet.
C'mon, really?
C'mon, really?
C'mon, really?
Wow. Why'd you do that? You could've taken those girls and did whatever you want with 'em! Hmph...you're a pretty nice person, aint'cha? Fair enough, I'll make sure to remember what you did for us.
Wow. Why'd you do that? You could've taken those girls and did whatever you want with 'em! Hmph...you're a pretty nice person, aint'cha? Fair enough, I'll make sure to remember what you did for us.
Wow. Why'd you do that? You could've taken those girls and did whatever you want with 'em! Hmph...you're a pretty nice person, aint'cha? Fair enough, I'll make sure to remember what you did for us.
Wow. Why'd you do that? You could've taken those girls and did whatever you want with 'em! Hmph...you're a pretty nice person, aint'cha? Fair enough, I'll make sure to remember what you did for us.
Hell no! You're still alive, so this fight ain't over at all!
Hell no! You're still alive, so this fight ain't over at all!

You're REAL annoying. I bet the other world leaders agree with me, too. Let's see if they agree with me when I tell everyone how much of an ass you are.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

You're REAL annoying. I bet the other world leaders agree with me, too. Let's see if they agree with me when I tell everyone how much of an ass you are.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

You're REAL annoying. I bet the other world leaders agree with me, too. Let's see if they agree with me when I tell everyone how much of an ass you are.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
I've had about as much of {1_PlayerName:textkey} as I can stand. What's say you an' me go beat 'em up and teach 'em a lesson?
I've had about as much of {1_PlayerName:textkey} as I can stand. What's say you an' me go beat 'em up and teach 'em a lesson?
I've had about as much of {1_PlayerName:textkey} as I can stand. What's say you an' me go beat 'em up and teach 'em a lesson?
I should go break your lover's arms and legs. Hey, if I do that, they'll be completely dependent on you! I'd be doin' ya a favor!
I didn't even finish middle school, an' I bet I could still score higher than you on a math test!
Your army is pathetic! What, ya reckon that you can just ask people nicely to leave when they come to raid your vaults and rape your women?
Yo, asshole. Wanna hear a joke? Your army.[NEWLINE]...that's the whole joke! Tchahaha!
You got balls, comin' up in here when we're tryin' to kill each other!
You got balls, comin' up in here when we're tryin' to kill each other!
Dammit...dammit! Fine, I know when I'm beaten! What do you want?
Dammit...dammit! Fine, I know when I'm beaten! What do you want?
Dammit...dammit! Fine, I know when I'm beaten! What do you want?
Bastard...I'm gonna make you eat those words. And those are some pretty rotten words.
Bastard...I'm gonna make you eat those words. And those are some pretty rotten words.
Bastard...I'm gonna make you eat those words. And those are some pretty rotten words.
Bastard...I'm gonna make you eat those words. And those are some pretty rotten words.
Bastard...I'm gonna make you eat those words. And those are some pretty rotten words.
Listen, and listen real good. I don't appreciate you tryin' to tell my girls that what my father believed was wrong. If I see another one of your missionaries on my turf...
Listen, and listen real good. I don't appreciate you tryin' to tell my girls that what my father believed was wrong. If I see another one of your missionaries on my turf...
Listen, and listen real good. I don't appreciate you tryin' to tell my girls that what my father believed was wrong. If I see another one of your missionaries on my turf...
Glad to hear you listen to reason. Makes you a lot smarter than a lotta Magical Girls.
Glad to hear you listen to reason. Makes you a lot smarter than a lotta Magical Girls.
Glad to hear you listen to reason. Makes you a lot smarter than a lotta Magical Girls.
Bastard...you're gonna pay for this, and it's gonna be soon.
Bastard...you're gonna pay for this, and it's gonna be soon.
Bastard...you're gonna pay for this, and it's gonna be soon.
Hmph. Fine, there's still a lotta other people out there who need to hear what my father preached. Don't think I'm gonna completely leave your people out of this, though.
Hmph. Fine, there's still a lotta other people out there who need to hear what my father preached. Don't think I'm gonna completely leave your people out of this, though.
Hmph. Fine, there's still a lotta other people out there who need to hear what my father preached. Don't think I'm gonna completely leave your people out of this, though.

...you have no clue what I've been through to get people to hear my father's words. And you think I'm gonna stop spreading those words just cause you gave me a cheap threat? Not a damn chance. You're lucky I don't knock you out for even suggestin' that.

...you have no clue what I've been through to get people to hear my father's words. And you think I'm gonna stop spreading those words just cause you gave me a cheap threat? Not a damn chance. You're lucky I don't knock you out for even suggestin' that.

...you have no clue what I've been through to get people to hear my father's words. And you think I'm gonna stop spreading those words just cause you gave me a cheap threat? Not a damn chance. You're lucky I don't knock you out for even suggestin' that.
